keepConnect.name: Fan nasctha
keepConnect.helperText: Má chliceálann tú ar an nasc Start, coinnigh an nasc. Éilíonn sé seo aird go ndéanfar an nasc a athcheangal go leanúnach tar éis dó a bheith dícheangailte.

url.name: Url
url.helperText: Nasc URL, mar shampla ws: //192.168.0.2: 7001, nó wws: //example.com/path
url.error: Is url é an URL ceart ag tosú le ws: // nó wws: //
